title: Champion Roadmap Questions.
body:
https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-pl/2018/04/champion-roadmap-april-2018/

Just some small question, hoping some1 will answer.

1. I hope you kept the voice actor for {{champion:266}} or at least made him sound somewhat the same, as i love hes voice as it is now.

2. The new champion, will it be a "he" or a "she" ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°).

3. All i'm hoping is that  {{champion:84}} won't be so obnoxious after 6 to be played against.  Any info we can get on that one?
